conversation.content: Good afternoon. I'm calling about a credit that was supposed to be applied to my primary account but went elsewhere.
Good afternoon, and thank you for calling. I'll help you resolve this right away. May I have your primary account number and the amount of the credit you're expecting?
The account number is 8847-2341 and the credit should be three hundred forty-seven dollars.
Thank you. I'm pulling up account 8847-2341 now, and I can see your current balance is $892.50. Let me check our credit application logs to trace where that $347 credit was posted.
I received the credit confirmation email last Thursday but my balance hasn't changed at all.

I understand your concern. I'm reviewing the transactions from Thursday, October 12th through today. I can see a pending credit notation but it appears to have been routed to a secondary account ending in 2349.
That's my old business account. I specifically requested this credit go to my primary account when I called.

I apologize for that error. I can see the note from your October 9th call at 2:47 PM clearly stating the credit should apply to the primary account. Let me initiate an immediate transfer to correct this.
How long will the transfer take? I need to make a payment against this account tomorrow.
The transfer will complete today. I'm processing it now with priority code PRI-7734-MK, which means the $347 will be available in your primary account within two hours, guaranteed by 5:00 PM Eastern.
That works. Will I receive confirmation when the transfer is complete?

Absolutely. You'll receive an email confirmation to your registered address within fifteen minutes showing the transfer initiation, and a second confirmation once it's fully posted to account 8847-2341.
I appreciate that. Can we also close that old business account to prevent this from happening again?

Certainly. I can close account 2349 right after the transfer completes. Before I do, let me verify it has a zero balance. I'm showing $0.00 currently, with the $347 credit as the only activity since March.
That's correct. It should have been closed months ago but apparently it's still active.
I've scheduled the closure for 5:30 PM today, immediately after the credit transfer finalizes. You'll receive closure confirmation via email with reference number CLS-8892-AAK for your records.
Perfect. Is there anything else you need from me to complete these transactions?

Everything is set on my end. Just to confirm, I've transferred $347 from account 2349 to your primary account 8847-2341, effective by 5:00 PM today, and scheduled the secondary account closure for 5:30 PM.
That's exactly what I needed. Thank you for handling this so efficiently.

You're very welcome. I've also added a note to your account about this issue to prevent any future misrouting. If you need anything else, please don't hesitate to call us at 1-800-445-8827. Have an excellent day.

scenario: asking why their credit wasn't applied to the correct account
